name: Atlas (itch) (HubblePie)
description:
Atlas is an adventure platformer where you play as Midori, a scholar who got bored studying books and decided to try her hand at making a living adventuring and drawing maps of uncharted territory.
Draw maps, turn them in for cash, and become the land's most prolific adventurer!

Created by Zach Vulgamott (Coder), Carly Riesterer  (Character Art), Connor McLauchlan (Environment Art), and Colin (Coder & Music).
